examples.example: 我们一家三口经常在周末一起去公园游玩，享受美好的时光。

translate.english: Our family of three often go to the park to play together on weekends and enjoy the wonderful time.

examples.example: 我们三个人齐心协力，一定能把这件事做好。

translate.english: The three of us work together with one heart, and we will surely be able to do this thing well.

examples.example: 我们三个好朋友总是互相鼓励，共同进步。

translate.english: The three of us good friends always encourage each other and make progress together.
